CF-JSON

JSON encoding for weather, ocean and climate data

Find Out More

Purpose

To provide an standard JSON format for the exchange of weather and climate data. CF-JSON is based on the NetCDF CF metadata conventions.

Specification

Features

CF compatible

Based on current

CF conventions

JSON compliant

Follows JSON standards.

rfc7159

Library support

Library support for common scientific programming languages.

Flexible

Supports any data structures, 3D grids to point data timeseries.
